name: Minimal Drone
details:
Desktop Drone SynthThis is a minimal drone synthesizer capable of dense sounds. Two oscillators modulate each other while a third selectable LFO adds more interesting rhythmic drones. There is also a low pass filter and volume. A CV input allows you to power the device with control voltages from 0-5V for interesting automated power sag results.
The die-cast aluminum enclosure is painted black. This was designed and hand-built in Oakland, California.
Audio Out: 1/4″ mono
CV Input: 1/8″ mono (0-5V)
Power: 9V Battery (included) or 9V DC Center-Negative (not included)

https://handmadeelectronicinstruments.com/product/minimal-drone/
